instruction.value: DAY +7. Administer until ANC greater than 1X109/L for greater than 24 hours. May administer by IV route.
DAY +7. Administer until ANC greater than 1X109/L for greater than 24 hours. May administer by SC route.

AdditionalNotes.value: Dose banding (based on 5 mcg/kg) to use full vials of filgrastim. Patient weight less than 60 kg: 300 mcg/dose. 60 to 90 kg: 480 mcg/dose. Greater than 90 kg: 600 mcg/dose.
